meanings.sent1: The cozy room had a warm, candlelighted atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The candlelighted dinner table looked romantic.
meanings.sent3: The spooky old house felt less eerie when candlelighted.
meanings.sent4: The candlelighted path through the forest seemed magical.
meanings.sent5: The candlelighted chandelier cast a soft glow in the room.

meanings.sent1: The candlelighted birthday cake was a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent2: The candlelighted altar in the church was beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The candlelighted picnic made the evening special.
meanings.sent4: The candlelighted pathway led the way through the garden.
meanings.sent5: The candlelighted lanterns flickered in the evening breeze.
